content.rendered:
NISH SIVANATHAN

Mortgage Agent - Commercial Lending

Level 1

  • 416.895.0891
  • nish@vinegroup.ca
  • English
  • Toronto

Introducing Nish, a versatile mortgage expert specializing in commercial and residential financing. With over 10 years of experience in the field, Nish has been instrumental in helping numerous clients achieve their real estate dreams across different domains.

Having transitioned from banking to becoming a mortgage and real estate agent, Nish brings knowledge and insights to the table. Whether clients are searching for commercial properties to fuel their entrepreneurial ambitions or cozy residential homes to call their own.

In commercial mortgages, Nish thrives on the excitement of helping businesses secure the necessary funding to thrive and expand. From retail spaces and office buildings to industrial properties, Nish deeply understands the complexities of commercial financing, offering expert guidance and unwavering dedication throughout the process.

Nish finds immense joy in assisting clients with residential mortgages, witnessing the sheer delight on their faces as they step into their dream homes. As a trusted advisor, Nish navigates the intricacies of residential mortgages with finesse, ensuring clients find the perfect loan that aligns with their unique needs and financial goals.

If you’re ready to embark on your mortgage journey, whether in the commercial or residential realm, don’t hesitate to connect with Nish. Together, you’ll navigate the path toward your real estate dreams, experiencing professional guidance, unwavering support, and the expertise needed to make informed decisions.

Contact Nish today and take the first step towards achieving your real estate aspirations.
